casebody.data:
MARY JANE WHITCOMB, joined by her husband, WILLIAM SELDON WHITCOMB, v. FOGARTY BROS. TRANSFER, INC. 24 So. (2nd) 239

June Term, 1945

December 18, 1945 Secial Division A Clyde H. Wilson and Wilbur W. Whitehurst, for appellants. McKay, Macfarlane, Jackson & Ferguson, Knowles & Kirk and Morris E. White, for appellee. PER CURIAM:

This appeal is from an order granting a new trial. We find no abuse of discretion and affirm the order. Also see Ward v. City Fuel Oil Company, Inc., 147 Fla. 320, 2 So. (2nd) 586, not cited in the briefs.

Affirmed.

CHAPMAN, C. J., BUFORD, THOMAS and ADAMS, JJ., concur.
